text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock @BorisJohnson My grandad was in Newham general hospital at the time, early on when it was the worst hit for deaths from COVID19 and he was on a ward where it was present he was tested and found negative and then sent back home straight away to avoid spread. My nan is now caring for him!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
